name: NO by D
description:
Way back in 2014, I was first getting into "queerness and games," and I started writing with Twine 1.4.2. "NO by D" was my first ever video game, brought to light in 2021 after being hidden under my pillow all these years. At the time I was identifying as a "queer girl," though now I am a non-binary transmasc. "D" was the name I was going by at the time. I haven't changed anything about the original game since I first finished it.

May contain depictions of intimate partner abuse, grad student drama/trauma, and of the early 2010s.
